title: Spacious Downstairs 2x2 - Near Big Tech Companies - Great Location
app_fee: $25 for each applicant over the age of 18
posting_body: ['Wanting a home that shines in the heart of the Silicon Valley?', 'Welcome Sandlewood, your bright new home in Sunnyvale.', 'We have an opening for Unit 5, a spacious 880 sqft.', 'Two Bedroom Two Bathroom apartment that features a private balcony, plush carpet, and a quiet community.', 'Our perfect perch on the cusp between Sunnyvale and Cupertino nestles us directly in the heart of the Silicon Valley, placing tech giants like Apple, Intel, Cisco, and Google right at our doorstep.', 'To the commuters looking for a quick trip, we are conveniently located near major highways 85, 101 and 280.', "And with nearby shopping, public transport, and the Sunnyvale Community Center right around the corner, you're never too far from your needs.", 'When you need a break from the hustle and bustle of the tech bubble, take a breather alongside our shimmering pool and relax.', 'Ready to be dazzled by the California sunshine?', 'Come visit us or click the link below to apply today!', '1166 Sunnyvale-Saratoga Rd.', 'Sunnyvale, CA 94087', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours', 'Tuesdays-Fridays 10am-5pm', 'Saturdays 10am-3pm']
